name: agent-loop-runner
description: Orchestrates AI agent runs over a list of URLs with fresh chat sessions, automated retry, and file-system-based status tracking.

agentLoopRunner.maxLoopsPerUrl.description: Outer max loops per URL. Passed into prompt header as MaxLoopsPerUrl.

agentLoopRunner.featureMapWindowMs.description: Window to map newly created progress files to the most recent unmapped running job.

agentLoopRunner.agentName.description: Name of the chat agent to address each prompt to (e.g. PlaywrightLoopPlanning). Must match a .github/agents/<name>.agent.md file.

agentLoopRunner.perJobTimeoutMs.description: Maximum milliseconds to wait for a single job's agent to write a status file. 0 = no timeout (default). Recommended: 1800000 (30 min) as a safety net for unattended runs.

agentLoopRunner.progressGlob.description: Glob pattern for progress-tracking files. Used to map agent-created progress files to running jobs.

agentLoopRunner.specGlob.description: Glob pattern for spec files generated by the agent.

agentLoopRunner.requirementsGlob.description: Glob pattern for requirements files generated by the agent.

agentLoopRunner.enableWorktree.description: When enabled, the extension creates a git worktree for each job so the agent never switches branches in the main working directory. On PASS, it commits/pushes the worktree branch and creates a PR.

agentLoopRunner.worktreeDir.description: Relative or absolute path for worktree directories. Each job creates a subdirectory here.

agentLoopRunner.prCreateCommand.default: az repos pr create --title "[Low][E2E] {FeatureName} agent test" --auto-complete
agentLoopRunner.prCreateCommand.description: Command to create a PR after pushing.  {FeatureName}, {RunId}, {Item} are replaced. Set empty to skip PR creation.

agentLoopRunner.commitGlob.description: Glob pattern (relative to worktree root) for files to git-add before committing. Appends {FeatureName}/ if the feature name is known.
